# polaris_operations (Data Source)

The `polaris_operations` data source is used to access information about the
valid operations that can be performed by the RSC account.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) SHA-256 hash of the operations.
- `operations` (List of String) Valid operations that can be performed by the RSC account.
